WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
I put a conditionnal formatting  on a cell.
I put a percentage cell format on this condition.
When I read this model and I write, condital formatting is saved but cell format is lost.
Could you correct it please ?
Thanks.

Comments.Message:
Mark, this is not a duplicate. 
The item #18183 was resolved on Release 1.7.8, but on this new release this issue here percentage and conditional formatting is not working. This is because the conditional formmating is applying right the colors but not the cell number format. Please can you confirm if this is the case? Or if there is any workaround for this issue?

Thank you,

Tiago
